text: Peter Anthony DeFazio (born May 27, 1947) is an American politician. He was the U.S. Representative for from 1987 to 2023. He is a member of the Democratic Party. He was one of the founders of the Congressional Progressive Caucus.. ==References== Category:1947 births Category:Living people Category:United States representatives from Oregon Category:Politicians from Massachusetts Category:Democratic Party (United States) politicians Category:People from Springfield, Oregon
title: Peter DeFazio
